column5: My inlaws have booked a cottage in Collingwood in August and was wondering if anyone can recommend a charterÂ for some trolling with my kids? Or is that a tough area for fishing in general? Thanks
I can not say which one to use,but there are a few charter boats that are in the Collingwood harbor.  Google search
Five Star in C/wood, don't know anything about him or U Catch Em in Meaford, he's good.
